name: Whoami
short_description: Tiny HTTP service that prints system information - perfect for testing.
description: Tiny HTTP service that prints system information - perfect for testing. Whoami is a self-hosted application focused on tools, utility, self-hosted, homelab. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Whoami on your home server to tiny http service that prints system information - perfect for testing without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Whoami to manage your tools workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
